text: Internet can be a dangerous place, Do you sometimes worry

We hear these worries a lot from our clients, parents, teenagers, and friends outside IT industry, we could go on and on. Security is difficult and people from all layers of security struggle with these questions.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to SecDesk@Home - your shield against cybercriminals in an increasingly digitized world. As technology advances, so do the threats, and SecDesk couldn't stand idly by any longer. We've witnessed too many hard-earned dollars fall into the hands of cybercriminals, and enough is enough. It's time for a solution designed to protect individuals like you who are active online.

yourShield.title: Your Shield
yourShield.description: SecDesk@Home is more than just a security subscription; it's your personalized defense mechanism crafted by the security specialists at SecDesk. Our mission is clear: to create a more secure world, and SecDesk@Home extends that mission directly to you, the consumer market. With our comprehensive security measures in place, you can navigate the digital landscape with confidence, knowing that your personal information and hard-earned assets are safeguarded against cyber threats.

jointheMovement.title: Join the Movement
jointheMovement.description: Take control of your online security today by joining the SecDesk@Home community. Together, we can build a safer digital environment for everyone. Don't let cybercriminals dictate your online experience any longer. With SecDesk@Home, you have the power to protect yourself and contribute to a more secure world. Join us in our mission and secure your peace of mind with SecDesk@Home.

heading: We are there for you
when you can’t turn
to others
qualityCard.content: Online security threats may come unannounced and this is exactly where our services can really prove to be helpful to you. Don’t rely on George because we know he is not coming to save you in the middle of the night. Let him sleep and put Secdesk to action.

left.heading: Trustworthy
left.content: All our employees are under very strict Non-Disclosure Agreements

left.heading: Accessible
left.content: Quick and discrete answers to your troubles

right.heading: Available
right.content: We are always available, also when your tech-savvy aunt or friend is not

right.heading: Multilingual
right.content: Currently available in: Dutch, English, Romanian. Request for a new language.

carouselCurrentSubscription.title: What we’re offering in the current subscription

cardProps.title: Understanding Terms and Conditions 0
cardProps.description: Tired of deciphering dense legal jargon? We've got you covered. Our platform provides easily digestible summaries of terms and conditions, so you can understand exactly what you're getting yourself into.

cardProps.title: Helpdesk 1
cardProps.description: Need assistance navigating the complexities of cybersecurity? Our helpdesk is here to lend a helping hand. Reserve a 30-minute call with our security experts and get answers to all your burning security questions.

cardProps.title: Leaked Credentials 2
cardProps.description: Safeguard your online accounts and check whether your credentials have leaked on the internet. Whether it's a password leak or a data breach, our system keeps a watchful eye on the web, ensuring that you're always one step ahead of cyber threats.

carouselUpcomingSubscription.title: That’s not all folks!
carouselUpcomingSubscription.description: We are still building hard to get you ever more secure, we can’t tell you everything yet, we can tell you however: during your subscription you get access to all newly added services for free and even get an early sneak peek if you like!
